Articles.Content: A little while ago I had a mod that had more streamlined (and IIRC more powerful) RCS thrusters. I accidentally deleted the mod and now I cant find it, and I could really use those RCS thrusters. Does anyone know What the name on the mod is or have a link to the download thread?

Do you know anything else about that mod? (F.i. specific other parts)

If you have a craft file with that specific RCS post that part here please. That is the best way i can check which RCS you require.

Thanks but I found the mod. Its the KW pack. The RCS I was looking for is the ones that look kinda like the hull of an airboat, you know, the ones that have a giant fan and are used in swamps and stuff. (I thought I put that little bit of info in the first post but... anyways doesnt matter now.)
